explains: v. 扩大；扩展（业务）；详述；（宇宙）膨胀；变得开朗（expand 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: expanding agent 膨胀剂；发泡剂
expanding universe 膨胀宇宙；扩展宇宙
expanding machine 扩管装置；扩径机；扩张机

sentences.en: The clear inference is that the universe is expanding.
sentences.cn: 显然结论是宇宙在扩大。

sentences.en: Engineers noticed that the pipes were not expanding as expected.
sentences.cn: 工程师们注意到管子并未像预期的那样膨胀。

sentences.en: The recession knocked on the head any idea of expanding the company.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退使扩展公司的任何想法都化为泡影。
